name: Haggle Horror
description:
Help Hagatha the Haggling Hag haggle with the market vendors to get the last few ingredients she needs to finish making her privilege potion. Beware though - Hagatha only has 40 bucks and vendors can only deal with so much of her bullcrap. It’s on you to talk the vendors down so that you can make your money last and help Hagatha get back to walking around telling people to go back to their own dimension.

Move with arrow keys and press Space to slice. Slice discount tags to reduce the price and save money. Getting hit by projectiles will cause vendors to lose patience. Collect two of each item before running out of cash to win!

This game was made for "Blackthornprod Game Jam #3" which had the theme "Less is More"

Credits

Art by @uniteddivisions

Programming by @drmanatee

Music by @jbodah

Most of the assets are original. A few sound effects were edited from free sources: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1GuNNRxZBAxbjEN03LQaxyrjSLT85rMzeZkHfubyY7Ng/...
